Summary: Strange Objects on NASA's STS-131 shuttle camera.....
divs: Sighting DetailsI viewed the shuttle launch this morning at 6:21 am and once they released the booster rockets and switched camera angle so you see the rear of shuttle, starlike ufo's are visible traveling in different directions, then there's video interference and they stop airing live feed and begin to re-broadcast the initial launch again ( which ends abrubtly after rocket booster jetisen and it loops again ) unfortunately I wasn't able to record this and I doubt even youtube will get this, but if they do definately take a look at it. " Absence of evidence, is not evidence of absence and governments must never lie to the people" quote from Sgt. Clifford Stone, Disclosure Project military witness. If you haven't viewed the documentary "UFO-The Greatest Story Ever Denied" take a look it's quite amazing.
